title: Wide Selection
body: We offer wide range of laptops to buy from. From gaming laptops to professional office laptops, everything is available here.

title: Affordable price
body: We source all of our laptops from manufacturer directly, so that you get best prices on our platform.

title: 6 Months Warranty
body: You can be relieved and assured about your laptop as we provide 6 months of full replacement warranty in case of any fault.
